page.title: 18A Day In My Life. Cont..
page.content:
say our prayers.After that we go back to our classrooms and we start work.
Our subjects include English,Mathematics,Geography,History, Nature Study,Science,Religious Education,Physical Education and Art and Craft.
To help us with our work we use a television ,tape recorder,radio,video recorder and computer.
Near the end of school Mr.Clarke will tell us a story.Then the bell will go at 3.45pm.,we will say a prayer and go home.
When I get home I will practise my violin and then play with my dolls.Then I have my dinner and watch television. Bedtime is at 8.45pm.
